dictionary.beginners_ordinary_people_professionals_: We help beginners make money like professional traders. We help everyone make money
dictionary.mind_business_smart_yoko_robot_everythin: You may go about your own business while Smart Yoko robot does everything for you.
dictionary.coin_analysis: Selects the best coins for successful trading
dictionary.robot_nalyzes_charts_selects_successful_: The robot itself analyzes the charts and selects successful coins for trading.
dictionary.knows_buy_sell_closes_profitable_trades: He knows where to buy and sell. Closes only profitable trades.
dictionary.robot_not_need_sleep_works_monitors_situ: The robot doesn’t need sleep or rest, it works and monitors the market situation without breaks and days off while you rest
dictionary.your_money_your_money_your_stored_exchan: Your money is only your money! Your funds are stored on the exchange and only you have access to them. The robot can’t deposit or withdraw money, it can only open and close trades.
dictionary.we_work_largest_exchanges: We work with the largest exchanges
dictionary.we_want_you_earn: We want you to make money
dictionary.we_connect_robot_absolutely_charge._subs: We connect the robot absolutely free of charge. No subscription fee. We only take % of your profits earned while trading with our Yoko robot. When you first connect, the profit percentage will be calculated after the trial period, so you have 14 days to test the Yoko robot completely free of charge. Then, you will only need to pay a percentage of the profit. Our profit depends on yours.
dictionary.percentage_profit_calculated_size_deposi: the percentage of profit is calculated based on the amount of your deposit and the trading period, more details can be found in your account.
dictionary.keep_track_latest_robot_trades: Keep track of the latest robot trades
dictionary.everything_become_simple_understandable: makes the process simple and understandable
dictionary.connect_robot_easy_steps: Connect your robot in 4 easy steps
dictionary.register_website_get_personal_account: Register on our website and get a personal account
dictionary.account_exchange_register_referral_bonus: If you do not have an account on the exchange yet, you can register it using our referral link and get a bonus
dictionary.receive_detailed_instructions_connecting: You will receive detailed instructions for connecting the robot to your account on the exchange
dictionary.robot_trades_follow_transactions_persona: Now the robot trades, and you follow the transactions in your personal account and make money
dictionary.keep_track_transactions_convenient_perso: Keep track of your transactions in a User-friendly personal account
dictionary.follow_full_statistics_trading_device_wh: Follow the full statistics of trading with Yoko robot from any device and wherever you are.
dictionary.your_goal_profit_will_help_this: Your goal is profit, and we will help you with this
dictionary.combined_trading_strategies_trading_comb: We have combined two of the best trading strategies in one. Smart averaging trading combined with the best pump analysis on the market. All stated above allows you to trade with maximum efficiency. Learn more about the strategy.
dictionary.robot_simultaneously_unlimited_automatic: The robot can trade simultaneously with an unlimited number of coins and automatically switch between trading pairs.
dictionary.capabilities_control_panel_trading_setti: We’ve increased your capabilities and added more than 30 trading settings to the robot control panel, which allows you to trade effectively regardless of market behaviour. We also added ready-made ranges of settings that match your deposit amount. Customize your Yoko robot and improve your trading.
dictionary.connect_telegram_account_notify_transact: Connect the telegram bot to your account and it will notify you every time about new deals.
dictionary.personal_account_simulation_mode_deposit: Now in your personal account you can turn on the trading simulation mode and check how the robot would trade with your deposit for the last 60 days, and find out how much you would earn if you traded with the Yoko robot.
dictionary.affiliate_program_profit_commission_with: Join our affiliate program and GET 30% of our profit commission for every user you INVITE. WE quickly withdraw your percentage from each referral to your crypto wallet.
dictionary.example_riviews: Suddenly, the conclusions made on the basis of Internet analytics to this day remain the lot of liberals who are eager to be declared violating the universal norms of ethics and morality. Modern technologies have reached such a level that understanding the essence of resource-saving technologies creates the need to include a number of extraordinary events in the production plan.
dictionary.best_cryptocurrency_trading: The Best Cryptocurrency Trading Bots in 2022
dictionary.cryptocurrency_changing_market _change_r: Cryptocurrency is a rapidly changing market, so information about trading bots changes frequently. Prices change, features are added, and ratings change. We've made three major changes to this version of our article:

pages.commission_info1: We want you to make money! Use Yoko Bot and pay only if you make money yourself.
pages.commission_info2: After every two weeks of trading with our robot, we take 20% of the profit that the robot has made. Your balance in your personal account on the site will become negative, and you will have three days to pay off the profit commission. If the commission is not paid, the robot is disabled.
